name: TextFieldValidator
summary: Validate textField's text property to ensure some text exists, and present an alert if it doesn't in just a few lines.
description:
Validate one or more textField's text property to ensure some text exists, and present an alert if it doesn't in just a few lines. Multiple textFields being passed in to the validator will be validated at once, and the message set for the textField will be separated by ",
" by default. There is a closure which by default is set to an empty closure. Code in the closure triggers when the alert is dismissed (OK is tapped).
